bibl.title: Column Layout in Oxyrhynchus Literary Papyri: Maas's Law, Ruling and Alignment Dots.
bibl.note: Investigation of over 250 extant literary works among the Oxyrhynchus papyri, listed in: IDEM, The Literary Papyrus Roll: Formats and Conventions. An Analysis of the Evidence from Oxyrhynchus, Diss. Yale Univ., 1992. Detailed description of 11 papyri showing markings added by the scribe to guide the layout of his text: P. Oxy. XV, 1815; XVII, 2098; 2102; XXIV, 2402; XLVIII, 3376; XLIX, 3447; L, 3552; XXXIX, 2889; XVIII, 2161; 2162; XX, 2245.
